name: Ammad Iftikhar
tagline: I build scalable, full-stack web applications with modern tech.
summary: Experienced MERN Stack Developer passionate about creating dynamic, responsive, and scalable web applications. I specialize in React.js, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB with expertise in building robust frontend interfaces and backend APIs. My approach combines technical excellence with creative problem-solving to deliver exceptional full-stack solutions.

experience.title: Software Engineer
highlights: Developed full-stack MERN applications for non-profit organization managing schools across district
Built responsive frontend interfaces with React.js and robust backend APIs with Node.js/Express and MongoDB
Created and maintained admin dashboards for office management systems with real-time updates
Built online medical store system with product management, order handling, and Stripe payment integration
Shipped scalable, high-performance applications serving thousands of users

experience.title: Software Engineer
highlights: Developed and optimized React.js components for dynamic, responsive web applications
Applied data analysis and cleaning techniques to ensure accurate frontend data display
Managed Amazon drop-shipping platform with product listing optimization and order fulfillment
Improved user interactivity and overall user experience through data-driven design

projects.name: AI Attorney
projects.summary: AI-powered legal services platform with landing page, draft screen, and library management. Built responsive frontend with Remix and integrated backend APIs for legal advice, document drafting, and client management.

projects.name: Metro Pakistan Assessment
projects.summary: Employee performance assessment system integrating React.js frontend with Node.js and PostgreSQL backend for automated evaluations and comprehensive reporting.

projects.name: Campus Pro
projects.summary: Comprehensive audit system for nonprofit school operations enabling efficient management of academic processes and administrative tasks with school audits.

projects.name: Office Management System
projects.summary: Centralized platform for employee records management, leave tracking, and attendance monitoring with automated workflows and real-time notifications.

projects.name: Event Vista
projects.summary: Full-stack event booking platform where users browse company profiles and book events. Admin dashboard for event approvals, creation, and gallery management with role-based authentication.
